comments.en:
This is a rebadged Lexmark printer. Play with various Lexmark inkjet drivers to figure out which works.

Someone please report what works and which Lexmark this really is!

The Compaq cartridges are the same as the Lexmark ones except for a little plastic tab designed to make them mutually incompatible. I think you can break off the tab and have it work. (Not that there's much point; both lines of cartridges cost a bundle).

I've got one report who said he tried every driver in Mandrake 7.2 and failed. There are one or two other drivers, but it's looking poor thus far...

It seems that this printer is more or less compatible with Lexmark Z11.
